Question: Lameditech Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LAMEDITECH CES 2024

HandyRay-Pro (LMT-5000)

- Specialized laser device
- Minimizes pain and risk of cross-contamination
- Suitable for various capillary blood tests and POCT applications
Summary_cn:
LAMEDITECH CES 2024

HandyRay-Pro (LMT-5000)

- 专用激光设备
- 减少疼痛和交叉污染的风险
- 适用于各种毛细血管血液检测和POCT应用
